pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, December 8, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, December 8, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Yukon, Sandy Silver.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will host an Official Dinner for the Vice President of the United States of America, Joe Biden.

Sir John A. MacDonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive for 7:15 p.m.
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
